title: Implement Secure User Registration
description: As a user, I want to securely register my account, so that my personal information is protected.
acceptance_criteria: The system should support user registration, including input validation and secure storage of user data.
test_cases: Given the registration page, when the user submits valid details, then the account should be created securely.

title: Add Multi-Factor Authentication
description: As a user, I want to enable multi-factor authentication, so that I can secure my account with an additional layer of protection.
acceptance_criteria: The system should support multi-factor authentication with options such as SMS, email, or authenticator apps.
test_cases: Given the MFA setup page, when the user selects an MFA method and completes verification, then the account should be secured with MFA.

title: Display Personalized Dashboard
description: As a user, I want to view a personalized dashboard, so that I can quickly access my banking products and services.
acceptance_criteria: The dashboard should display a user's account summaries and personalized product recommendations.
test_cases: Given user login, when accessing the dashboard, the user should see their account summaries and personalized product recommendations based on their profile.

title: Develop Responsive Design
description: As a user, I want a responsive interface, so that I can have a seamless experience across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: The UI should adapt to desktops, tablets, and mobile phones while adhering to WCAG standards.
test_cases: Given any device, when accessing the portal, then the user should experience consistent and accessible navigation.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Streamline Account Opening
description: As a user, I want a guided workflow for account opening, so that I can complete the process with minimal effort.
acceptance_criteria: The workflow should validate inputs, autofill known data, and allow saving incomplete applications.
test_cases: Given the account opening page, when the user submits the form, then the inputs should be validated, autofilled, and savable for later.

title: Secure Document Upload
description: As a user, I want to securely upload documents, so that my data is protected during account requests and updates.
acceptance_criteria: The system should support secure document uploads, including storage and validation.
test_cases: Given the document upload page, when the user uploads a file, then the file should be securely stored and validated.

title: Real-Time Request Tracking and Notifications
description: As a user, I want to track my request statuses in real-time, so that I stay informed about major milestones.
acceptance_criteria: The system should notify users through email and in-portal for major milestones and show complete interaction history.
test_cases: Given a user request, when its status changes, then the user should receive an update via email and in-portal notification.

title: Integrate with Core Banking Systems
description: As a user, I want real-time data exchange with the bank's core systems, so that I get up-to-date information on my transactions.
acceptance_criteria: The system should synchronize customer data, transaction history, and service status reliably and consistently.
test_cases: Given a transaction update, when data is synchronized, then the user should see updated information in real-time.

title: Implement Role-Based Permissions
description: As an admin, I want to define permissions based on roles, so that user actions and data views are controlled.
acceptance_criteria: The system should restrict actions and data visibility based on predefined roles and business rules.
test_cases: Given a user role, when accessing the portal, then actions and data visibility should be appropriately restricted.

title: Ensure Data Security and Compliance
description: As a user, I want my data to be secure and compliant with regulations, so that my personal and financial information is protected.
acceptance_criteria: The system should include data encryption, secure communication channels, and compliance with regulations like GDPR.
test_cases: Given a data operation, when it is executed, then the data should be encrypted, transmitted securely, and logged for compliance.
